entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baie-James
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
